sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect} from "react"; import WeatherForecastService from '../../../adapters/WeatherForecastService'; import {getWeatherDescription, displayDateTime, convertTemperature} from '../../../businessLogic/WeatherBusinessLogic'; import {temperatureDropdownList} from '../../../buildingBlocks/commonBuildingBlocks.js' import '../../../styles/common/Header.scss' import i18n from 'i18next' import '../../../i18n' function WeatherForecastComponent(props){ console.log("som vo forecast component") console.log("props: " + JSON.stringify(props.history.location.state)) const [dailyWeatherForecast, setDailyWeatherForecast] = useState({} ) const [temperature, setTemperature] = useState({units : "celsius", abbreviation : "°C"}) useEffect(() =>{ console.log("som v useEffect forecast component") WeatherForecastService.getDailyForecastByCityName(props.history.location.state.lat,props.history.location.state.lon, "Current,Hourly,Minutely") .then( response => setDailyWeatherForecast(response.data)) }, [props.history.location.state.lat, props.history.location.state.lon]) return (
{temperatureDropdownList( (units, abbreviation ) => { setTemperature({"units" : units, "abbreviation" : abbreviation})}) }
{createHeader.call()} {createMainBody(dailyWeatherForecast, temperature)}
) } const createMainBody = (dailyWeatherForecast, temperature) => { return ( dailyWeatherForecast?.daily?.map(dailyWeather =>{ return( {displayDateTime(new Date(dailyWeather.sunrise * 1000))} {displayDateTime(new Date(dailyWeather.sunset * 1000))} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.temp.day).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.temp.min).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.temp.max).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.temp.night).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.temp.eve).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.temp.morn).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.feels_like.day).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.feels_like.night).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.feels_like.eve).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {`${convertTemperature(temperature.units, dailyWeather.feels_like.morn).toFixed(2)}${temperature.abbreviation}`} {dailyWeather.wind_speed} {dailyWeather.wind_deg} {getWeatherDescription(dailyWeather)} ) }) ) } const createHeader = () => { return ( {i18n.t(sunrise)} {i18n.t(sunset)} {i18n.t(temp)} {i18n.t(min)} {i18n.t(max)} {i18n.t(night)} {i18n.t(evening)} {i18n.t(morning)} {i18n.t(feelsLikeDay)} {i18n.t(feelsLikeNight)} {i18n.t(feelsLikeEvening)} {i18n.t(feelsLikeMorning)} {i18n.t(windSpeed)} {i18n.t(windDeg)} {i18n.t(description)} ) } export default WeatherForecastComponent
